mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEWS(RNUM, TID, MID, TITLE, WDATE, GRADE, CONTENT, RCM, OPS) VALUES(SEQ_RNUM.NEXTVAL, #{tid}, #{mid}, #{title}, SYSDATE, #{grade}, #{content}, 0, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT RNUM, TID, MID, TITLE, WDATE, GRADE, CONTENT, RCM, OPS FROM REVIEWS WHERE TID=#{tid} ORDER BY RNUM DESC
SELECT RNUM, TID, R.MID, NAME, TITLE, WDATE, GRADE, CONTENT, RCM, OPS FROM REVIEWS R, MEMBERS M WHERE R.TID=#{tid} AND R.MID = M.MID ORDER BY RNUM DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEWS SET RCM = RCM+1 WHERE RNUM=#{rnum}
UPDATE REVIEWS SET OPS = OPS+1 WHERE RNUM=#{rnum}
